mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM news WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (id, title, publisher, author, summary, imageurl, contenturl, publishedat, keyword, sections) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{publisher}, #{author}, #{summary}, #{imageUrl}, #{contentUrl}, #{publishedAt}, #{keyword}, #{sections, typeHandler=com.korea.news.mybatis.ListToStringTypeHandler})
